We're helping people compare banks for the best deals!

We're currently for a backend developer for our small and flexible team. We're slinging nodejs all day long at our young company with offices in Stockholm and Lund. We're expanding our internal CRM system as well as communicating with banks through their APIs. We're currently moving into new markets and need your help expanding!

shoot me an email: petter.nyman@consida.se
